nodes.text: James Arnold Taylor (born July 22, 1969) is an American voice actor. Considered an official "audio double" for Ewan McGregor, he has vocally portrayed Obi-Wan Kenobi in both the 2D Clone Wars animated micro-series and the 3D Star Wars: The Clone Wars animated film and TV series, as well as in several Star Wars video games. He has reprised his role as Obi-Wan Kenobi in Star Wars Rebels.

He is the only actor (voice or otherwise) to have portrayed Obi-Wan Kenobi more than four times in various Star Wars media. Taylor is also credited as voicing "group voice: bomber pilot" in the 2012 film Red Tails, executive-produced by George Lucas.
